name: Career Document Architect Rubric
description: Evaluation criteria for career document quality (statements, CV, biosketch)

criteria.name: Narrative Coherence
criteria.description: Quality of through-line connecting all elements

scores.2: Weak narrative; connections between sections unclear
scores.3: Adequate narrative but through-line could be stronger
scores.4: Good narrative; clear theme connecting past to future
scores.5: Excellent coherent narrative; compelling story arc throughout

criteria.name: Evidence-Based Claims
criteria.description: Quality of support for assertions about accomplishments

scores.1: Vague claims without evidence ('I am passionate about')
scores.3: Some evidence but not consistently quantified
scores.4: Good evidence with specific achievements and outcomes
scores.5: Excellent evidence; all claims supported with quantified specifics

criteria.name: Vision and Future Orientation
criteria.description: Quality of forward-looking content and research/career vision

scores.1: No future vision; only past accomplishments
scores.3: Some future direction but not compelling
scores.4: Good vision with specific future plans
scores.5: Compelling vision; clear trajectory with fundable/achievable goals

criteria.name: Audience and Fit
criteria.description: Tailoring to audience and institutional context

scores.1: Generic document not tailored to opportunity
scores.3: Some tailoring but fit could be stronger
scores.5: Excellent tailoring; content directly addresses audience priorities

criteria.name: Structure and Format
criteria.description: Adherence to expected structure and formatting

scores.2: Significant structural issues; hard to navigate
scores.5: Excellent structure; easy to scan, professional appearance

criteria.name: Impact and Significance
criteria.description: Quality of impact statements and significance framing

scores.1: No impact statements; just lists of activities
scores.4: Good impact framing; clear significance for most items
scores.5: Excellent impact statements; clear 'so what' for all content

passing_note: Average score must be â‰¥ 3.5 for document to be considered complete. Scores below 3 in 'Narrative Coherence' or 'Vision' require revision.
